title: What are these check marks?
content:
I'm recreating a box for a client and it needs to be exactly as it was before. I've got all the fonts down, but I cannot figure out what these check marks are - anyone have any idea?? Thanks for any help!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [whatarethesechecks.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017023415/http:/typophile.com/files/whatarethesechecks.png) | 5.2 KB |
author: stopkatie

comments.content:
Thanks pretty difficult to see. Do you have a larger graphic?

mw
I will scan it again tonight at a larger resolution and reupload. Check back then and thanks a lot.
Wouldn't it be easier to just make those than look for a font that matches them? Unless they're super complex seen up close, that seems like a five minute Illustrator job.
Zapf Dingbats has checkmarks that are close to those. Might even be what it is.
